name: Last Meow Standing
description:
You play as the world renowned CATventurer fighting off the ferocious hordes of the mouse mutants. To survive you need to master your arsenal of deadly weapons... and the banana gun. Test your skill and shoot for the highscore on the leaderboards.

Gameplay

  • You start with your full arsenal at your hands, ready to fight the mutants.
  • Don't worry about ammunition. When you empty your magazine you get a random new weapon.
  • When you get hit you lose a random piece of equipment.
  • Use your dash move to get out of precarious situations.

And that's about it. Pretty straight forward, isn't it? So what are you waiting for? Hop in and see if you can beat the highscores of your friends!
